name: Doomsday (itch) (Torito Games)
description:
An old game I did with Game Maker in one day.

A & D to move, don't die!

[SPOILER ALERT] - When do I beat the game?

So you have been playing it and the game seems endless or you just get killed?

Do you need to know how to win?

Is fine i will tell you then:

The game concept is based on risk-reward. As you have seen there is some black matter wave chasing you, avoiding it reaching you is the minimum you need to survive, but it doesn't grant success.

At some point in the game, you will find a rocket to escape the planet... but the time you need to reach it depends completely on your boldness and skills. The spawn of the rocket is triggered by getting a certain distance between you and the black matter wave. If you play conservative, stopping often to avoid the meteorites or going back... this might be an infinite game for you. But if you risk some close calls and keep consistently advancing you will beat the game within seconds.

Kind of philosophical stuff here, right? It wasn't on purpose! But just let's pretend...
